__e: How dare you say that about our mother?
Yeah, I gave him the book, and I told him, "you better not dare say a word,"
You dare to say such a thing to a man in his own home, as though all I have struggled to provide is not enough.
SO DON'T YOU DARE TELL ME I HAVE NO RIGHT TO BE WITH HIM,
How dare you say that to me when the first time we slept together, you were with another man.
Get in his cab or walk home, but don't come here again, you don't come to my place of work and you don't come to my house!
What the hell do you think you're doing to your mother in front of this girl?
How dare you talk about my father after all he's done for you?
You do not dare to talk about what happens, even among you.
How dare you enter my house with your shoes on!
How dare you come into my house and say such an ugly thing to me?
How dare you come in here and tell me to seek forgiveness!
You dare to talk to me like that in my own house?
Don't you dare talk to me about grief, because my fiancé died in my arms.
How dare you speak to me that way, after what you've been up to.
How dare you come here now and try to take her away from me.
How dare you come here and tell me I don't understand.
No, how dare you come here, after everything that you've done?

How dare you come into my house after what you've done.
